channel.title: Would this be good?
channel.description:
Hello I'm buying a new computer and I might as well use it for moparscape. Check it out.
http://www.circuitcity.com/ssm/HP-Pavilion-Media-Center-TV-PC-M8100N/sem/rpsm/oid/185192/catOid/-12962/rpem/ccd/productDetail.do
Tell me about how many people I can have on it untill the server start to lag (Including me in server too) . I have pretty fast internet. This will be with port forwarding not hamachi. Thanks.
Oh yeah and Windows Vista Premium can host a server right? I heard it blocks illegal stuff from someone. Idk. Someone help with this also thanks.

item.title: Would this be good?
item.dc:creator: @Zambo Zambo
item.description:
@Zambo wrote:

OMG crap lol it really does lag like hell?? even with dual 2.8 processor 500 hardrive 3 ram and dual 1.0 cache for processor??

http://www.circuitcity.com/ssm/HP-Pavilion-Media-Center-TV-PC-M8100N/sem/rpsm/oid/185192/catOid/-12962/rpem/ccd/productDetail.do

Read full topic

item.title: Would this be good?
item.dc:creator: @legend_rene legend rene
item.description:
@legend_rene wrote:

Im using vista HomeBasic and Ultimate , and I’ll tell you your computer laggs like hell when running a server
You dont have to buy a new computer to run a server , depends on the speed of your current

BTW: Clients might ruin your computers bootsector

Read full topic

item.title: Would this be good?
item.dc:creator: @Jonna Jonna
item.description:
@Jonna wrote:

Vista run’s sever yeh.

Read full topic
